flawed_nl_solution:
This week, 80 - 20 = <<80-20=60>>60 people watched the first game.
While 80 + 15 = <<80+15=95>>95 people watched the third game.
A total of 80 + 60 + 95 = <<80+60+95=234>>234 people watched the games this week.
Thus, 234 - 200 = <<234-200=34>>34 more people watched the games this week than last week.
#### 34

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 235, not 234. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
